segments.text: You look like being on cloud nine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What has made you so happy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you ? Who's the lucky girl ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are in the same math class . Our teacher sat us next to each other .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you like best about her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She's very funny . She makes me laugh all the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess it was fate working to bring you together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whatever brought us together , I'm happy .
segments.speaker: S2
